1.title: Thieves in the Night
1.plot: Dressed up with insider facts and Xtra Scenes - A paramedic from Kentucky and a fashion editor from Washington struggle to survive in the Mayan Jungle of the Yucatan, where deadly sinkholes conceal legions of disease-ridden bats.

3.title: Forbidden Fruit
3.plot: Dressed up with insider facts and Xtra Scenes - An environmentalist and an endurance athlete attempt to survive in the blistering heat of Central Brazil's savanna region where maned wolves and jaguars rule the land.

4.title: A Screw Loose
4.plot: With bonus footage and extra facts - In a haunted jungle, a painful injury tests the resolve of a survivalist. They are faced with suffocating humidity, hungry predators, torrential rainfall, unrelenting insects and intoxicating fruit.

5.title: Swamp Queen
5.plot: Dressed up with insider facts and Xtra Scenes - A badass mom from Louisiana and a shaman who practices martial arts from California take on jaguars and boa constrictors in the haunted Lacandon Jungle of Southern Mexico.

7.title: Loaded for Bear
7.plot: Dressed up with insider facts and Xtra Scenes - A medical rep and a U.S. Air Force sergeant struggle to survive in the Smoky Mountains of Tennessee where 800-pound black bears and timber rattlesnakes rule the land.

8.title: Category 5 Survival
8.plot: Dressed up with insider facts - An Iraqi war refugee living in Iowa and a biologist from California struggle to survive in the swamplands of Central Florida, where they battle black bears, alligators and Hurricane Irma.

9.title: Love at First Fight
9.plot: Dressed up with insider facts and Xtra Scenes - Instant attraction gives way to unforgiving conditions on an island in the middle of Lake Nicaragua. Surrounded by bull sharks, a river guide and a ski patroller struggle to survive.

10.title: Blindsided
10.plot: Dressed up with insider facts and Xtra Scenes - A former military police officer and a returning Naked and Afraid survivalist seeking redemption struggle to survive in the coastal jungle of Panama where venomous snakes lurk underfoot.

11.title: Trouble in Paradise
11.plot: Dressed up with insider facts and Xtra Scenes - A loner from Southern Maryland and an environmental scientist from South Africa struggle to survive in the rain-soaked Honduran jungle where jaguars watch from above.

12.title: Island of Tears
12.plot: Dressed up with insider facts and Xtra Scenes - In this special episode, two lucky fans are selected for a 14-day challenge in Panama. Can an IT consultant and a snowboarder graduate from super fans to true survivors?

17.title: Unhinged
17.plot: Dressed up with insider facts and Xtra Scenes - An ex-marine and a perky Southern gal take on jaguars and venomous snakes in the rain-soaked jungle of Panama.

18.title: Texan Torture
18.plot: Dressed up with insider facts and Xtra Scenes - A surfer from Hawaii and an ex-Army major from South Carolina take on rattlesnakes, wild boar and flash floods in Texas Hill Country.

19.title: Rise Above
19.plot: Dressed up with Xtra Scenes, Naked Confessions and a First Look at the upcoming brand-new survivalists - A horse trainer and a wilderness instructor take on caiman, piranha and anaconda in the rain-soaked jungle of Amazonia.

20.title: The Danger Within
20.plot: Dressed up with insider facts, Xtra Scenes and Naked Confessions - A resilient mom from Washington and a quirky spider-lover take on the alligators and black bear of the remote Seminole Forest of Florida.

21.title: Arachnid Overload
21.plot: Dressed up with insider facts and Xtra Scenes - A survival-savvy yoga instructor from Colorado and a custom knifemaker from New Hampshire take on jaguars, venomous spiders and blood-sucking ticks in the brutal jungle of Colombia.

22.title: King of the Forest
22.plot: Dressed up with facts, Xtra Scenes, Naked Confessions and First Look casting footage - A self-proclaimed "King of the Forest" and a skilled endurance athlete take on the thorny, snake-filled Alabama backwoods.

23.title: From the Ashes
23.plot: Dressed up with Xtra Scenes, Naked Confessions and a First Look at the upcoming brand-new survivalists - A biology student and an expert survival instructor take on the swampy, mosquito-infested shores of Croatia.

24.title: Stone Cold
24.plot: Dressed up with insider facts and Xtra Scenes - An Army vet and a newlywed take on the Velebit Mountains of Croatia. Extreme hunger and frigid temperatures force this unlikely pair to bond, but a vicious storm threatens to rip them apart.

25.title: Frozen in Fear
25.plot: Dressed up with facts, Xtra Scenes, Naked Confessions and First Look casting footage - A marine biologist and a special forces veteran risk hypothermia as they take on the Canadian wilderness.

26.title: Bad Blood
26.plot: Dressed up with insider facts, Xtra Scenes - A fourth degree black belt and a stay-at-home dad take on caiman and boa constrictors in the drought-stricken jungle of Nicaragua.

27.title: Washed Out
27.plot: Dressed up with insider facts, Xtra Scenes and interviews with the survivalists Before They Were Naked - An extreme athlete and a book-smart bartender take on pumas and venomous snakes in the rain-soaked cloud forest of Ecuador.

28.title: Strength in Pain
28.plot: Dressed up with insider facts, Xtra Scenes - An adventuress who is afraid of the dark and a homeless wilderness instructor take on vipers and jaguars in the rainforest of Honduras.

29.title: The Monster
29.plot: Dressed up with insider facts and Xtra Scenes - A California Buddhist and an Oregon fisherman test their skills against the unforgiving Australian outback where harsh conditions and saltwater crocodiles threaten their survival.

32.title: Melt Down Under
32.plot: Dressed up with insider facts, Xtra Scenes - A Swedish adventure guide and a Texas military vet take on Australia's Outback, where cultural differences lead to a shocking series first.

1.title: Lost at Sea
1.plot: Dressed up with insider facts and Xtra Scenes - For the first time in Naked and Afraid history, two survivalists are stranded at sea. A Divemaster and a Navy SEAL fend off hungry sharks in search of land in the West Indies.

2.title: Eye of the Storm
2.plot: Dressed up with insider facts and Xtra Scenes - A former wild child and a retired police sergeant take on South Central Belize following a catastrophic hurricane. Can they survive in a rainforest that has been turned completely upside down?

3.title: The Lost World
3.plot: Dressed up with insider facts and Xtra Scenes - In this special episode, two lucky fans are selected for a 14-day challenge in South Africa. Can a single mom and an optimistic novice graduate from super fans to true survivors?

4.title: Ashes to Ashes
4.plot: Dressed up with insider facts and Xtra Scenes - A survival instructor from California and a retired infantry officer suffering from PTSD take on the barren landscape of the volcano-ravaged Caribbean island of Montserrat.

5.title: Curse of the Swamp Part 1
5.plot: Dressed up with insider facts and Xtra Scenes - A former Naked and Afraid survivalist returning for a shot at redemption and an Air Force veteran take on cottonmouths and wild hogs in the haunted swamps of Louisiana.

6.title: Curse of the Swamp Part 2
6.plot: Dressed up with insider facts and Xtra Scenes - After his first partner tapped out, a redemption-seeking survivalist continues his challenge with a second partner. Will the new duo survive the bug-infested, haunted swamp of Louisiana?

8.title: The Hunted
8.plot: A mother of four and a country boy are dropped into the jaguar filled jungle of Belize. While they hunt for food, something is hunting them, and the mental part of the challenge gets to them both. Can they survive the jungle and themselves?

9.title: Belize Breakdown
9.plot: Dressed up with insider facts and Xtra Scenes - In this special fan episode, pro surfer Anastasia Ashley and YouTube star Cory Williams take on the Belizean jungle in a 14-day challenge.
